text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III G531GW Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i9-9880H 8-Core, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA RTX 2070, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3xUSB 3.1, 1xHDMI, Win 10 Pro)!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III G531GW Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i9-9880H 8-Core, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA RTX 2070, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3xUSB 3.1, 1xHDMI, Win 10 Pro) is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III G531GW Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i9-9880H 8-Core, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA RTX 2070, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3xUSB 3.1, 1xHDMI, Win 10 Pro) is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III G531GW Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i9-9880H 8-Core, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA RTX 2070, Wifi, Bluetooth, 3xUSB 3.1, 1xHDMI, Win 10 Pro) is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
